item.title: Youtube Short Stories Creator - 3D AI Animated Videos-2 - Upwork
item.description:
An experienced video creator is needed to create 15 one minute short stories videos.  3D animated stories with scenes and image prompts will be provided for you to generate images, create motions for images and then piece all elements together to create one minute animated short stories.  This is a test project, with the right fit, there will be ongoing projects.  Budget = $100 for all 15 one minute short stories.  In placing your bid, please show your best past similar work.  Only professionals with past work demos will be considered.  Thanks.

Budget: $100

item.title: Creative Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We're seeking a talented and imaginative video editor to join our team! Your primary responsibilities will include editing short form comedy clips and long form YouTube videos, ensuring each piece captures our comedic essence.

Responsibilities:
Edit short form comedy clips for social media platforms (TikTok, Instagram, etc.)
Edit long form YouTube videos
Enhance video content with creative edits, effects, and transitions
Ensure videos are engaging and align with our comedic style
Collaborate with our team to understand the vision for each video

Requirements:
Proven experience in video editing is required, and experience specifically in comedy is a plus.
Proficient in editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar)
Strong understanding of comedic timing and pacing
Ability to add graphics, subtitles, and other elements to enhance videos
Attention to detail and strong communication skills

To Apply:
Submit your resume and a brief cover letter
Include a sample of your work: We want to see if your style fits our needs, so please provide a link to a short form clip and a long form YouTube video you’ve edited.

We look forward to seeing your creativity in action. :)


Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 11:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Videography
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Creative Video Editor Needed-1 - Upwork
item.description:
Creative and patient video editor is needed to create/edit batches of Youtube videos, mostly youtube shorts.  This is a test project, if we find you to be a great team player with us, the project can be turned into long term.   

The project budget is for a collection of Youtube short videos. Project details will be given to you if we find you to be a good fit.

When you place your bid, please let us know the following:

1) Are you familiar with using Capcut, Filmora or Canva?   What is your most preferred editing software?

2) This is not required, but we'd like to know what your other capabilities are - Are you familiar in using video generating ai tools (the ones that can use text to video or video to video or image to video?  If  you do, which ones do you know how to use?  Also, Are you familiar in using image generating ai tools?  If  you do, which ones do you know how to use?

3) What is your internet speed?  If we find you to be a good fit to help us long term, how many hours per week can you devote to help us?  Can these hours be spread out Monday through Friday?  Or, you will be working on weekends?

Please show us your past related video work.

Look forward to working with you!  We hope you are a great match for our project!

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 26, 2024 11:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Capcut Videoeditor / Descript Video & Podcast Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for two things. When you apply please indicate if you are applying for #1, #2 or both:

1. CapCut Video editor to create short videos for IG reels / Tiktok in "talking head" form + engaging videos using various transitions. I will be providing the recorded video snippets and a link to a video inspiration + how to create it in caput, and need you to do the best out of the provided material
The volume of work - pax. 5-10 short videos / month.

2. Descript Video + Audio editor for Podcast. I am recording 2 podcasts/per month and need you to edit the raw recording in terms of speech, audio, and captions and create short-form videos out of the podcast recording, whereas I am happy to highlight the recording extracts for the short videos.



Hourly Range: $8.00-$12.00

item.title: Social Media Content Creator for Rasta/Jamaican Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are a dynamic team looking for a content creator who shares our passion for reggae music and the Rastafari faith. We create engaging and creative content for our social media platforms and other communication channels.

Role Summary:
We seek a talented Freelancer with Canva, Photoshop, After Effects, and VEED.io expertise to create visually stunning and engaging content. The ideal candidate will have a profound interest in reggae music and possess an in-depth understanding of the Rasta faith. Experience in crafting prompts for chat GPT to create compelling social media posts is essential.

Responsibilities:
• Design and create high-quality graphics and video content using Canva, Photoshop, After Effects, and VEED.io.
• Collaborate with our team to brainstorm and create engaging content that reflects our brand's identity and our passion for reggae music and Rastafari culture.
• Find and curate viral content which is aligned we our brand.
• Craft engaging prompts for chat GPT to construct social media posts and other engaging content.
• Ensure all content is consistent with brand guidelines and quality standards.

Must-Have:
• Experience in graphic design, video editing, and content creation.
• Expertise in Canva, Photoshop, After Effects, and VEED.io is required.
• Strong knowledge of and interest in reggae music and the Rastafari faith.
• Experience creating prompts for GPT-based chat and constructing engaging social media posts.
• Great Researcher
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
• Ability to work independently and meet project deadlines.

Please apply with the subject heading ‘Rasta’ if you believe you have the skills and experience to thrive in this role.


Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 10:37 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Canva
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Canva
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

- Proficiency in motion graphics software (Adobe Premiere Pro)

item.title: Luxury EV Ride-Hailing Homepage Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and creative video producer to create an engaging, high-quality video for the homepage of our luxury electric vehicle (EV) ride-hailing platform, Eel Rides. The video should embody the essence of luxury, sophistication, sustainability, and customer care, showcasing our premium service offerings. The final product will be used to captivate and attract our target audience, establishing a strong first impression of our brand.

Responsibilities:

Concept Development:

Collaborate with us to understand the brand ethos, target audience, and key messages.
Develop a creative concept that aligns with our brand identity and luxury market positioning.
Scriptwriting:

Create a compelling script that highlights the unique features and benefits of our luxury EV ride-hailing service.
Emphasise aspects such as luxury, convenience, sustainability, and superior customer experience.
Storyboard Creation:

Develop a detailed storyboard outlining the video’s visual flow and key scenes.
Ensure the storyboard effectively translates the script into visual elements that convey luxury and sophistication.
Video Production:

Utilise high-quality stock footage where necessary to meet the video’s visual requirements.
Incorporate scenes as per the following outline:
Scene One: A dark room with lights turning on to reveal a luxury EV from the front.
Scene Two: A detailed shot of the car's luxurious interior.
Scene Three: Showcasing beautiful places in London or the Berkshire region.
Scene Four: The EV on the road, arriving at a very beautiful hotel with a green, pristine feel.
Scene Five: The car's interior, featuring the chauffeur/driver in a black suit (preferably a woman driver).
Scene Six: Beautiful luxury locations in London.
Scene Seven: A quick shot of someone with a disability being picked up.
Ensure all cars featured in the video are electric vehicles (EVs).
Post-Production:

Edit the footage to create a polished, seamless video.
Add high-end graphics, animations, and transitions that enhance the luxury feel.
Include a sophisticated background score that complements the visual elements.
Revisions and Finalisation:

Collaborate with us to make necessary revisions and ensure the final video meets our expectations.
Deliver the final video in a web-optimised format suitable for our homepage.


Hourly Range: $3.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 10:19 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Illustrator, Web Development, Video Production, Content Writing
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Illustrator, Web Development, Video Production, Content Writing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
